trends: There have been 5 other sightings in New Albany
There were no other sightings in New Albany on or around August 13th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching the meteor shower on the 13th when i saw a star appear that was a bit brighter than the others moving down the sky. I at first thought it was a satellite, then it took a hard 45 degree right turn and then a approx. 80 degree hard turn back left and then faded out. My jaw instantly dropped wide open, since this was my first sighting after many nights of star gazing. Never thought i would see this in my area
